articles.content: The Neversshould be a triumphant TV homecoming for Joss Whedon. It’s the first series in more than a decade solely created by the man responsible for Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Angel, and Firefly. (He… [+9196 chars]

articles.title: Hemingway scholars fixate on his father. Ken Burns gives his mother equal time. - The Washington Post
articles.description: In a new documentary on Ernest Hemingway, Ken Burns makes it clear that Grace Hall Hemingway played a less heralded, but crucial role in her son's life
